ai-patthana15.72:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.72:0.3_0: for the sake of finding fault with requisites,
ai-patthana15.72:1.1_0: The results of causes and reasons not give rise to recollecting the teaching.
ai-patthana15.72:2.1_0: results in conflict with the Teaching, not by the Teaching, or by conditions;
ai-patthana15.72:2.1_1: resultant principles, without cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.72:2.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana15.72:3.1_0: One who has not taken part in the formless states and does not give rise to death, or with no cause or condition.
